name: LDLCodeLOINC
title: LDL Code LOINC
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains the LDL cholesterol measurement as collected from serum or plasma specimen to capture the actual lab value of LDL cholesterol was measured or collected.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
